Name: Happy Day
About the game: Happy Day – a first-person game, with a small town on Christmas being the scene. Here, all the people are nice and kind, and everyone goes to their neighbors’ place for a cup of tea every day. The town doesn’t even have a police office as no one commits any crimes here. You task is to walk around the city and wish a merry Christmas to your neighbors. Because your town is the most wonderful place in the world!
